allow: SlashCommand(/impl-chatbot complete RAG chatbot implementation for T028-T030: enhance existing backend/app/api/chatbot.py and backend/app/core/rag.py to support full RAG query pipeline with selected_text parameter)

Read the outline at frontend/docs/module1-ros2-nervous-system/outline.md and expand each section into detailed educational content with explanations, examples, and code snippets. Write the content to frontend/docs/module1-ros2-nervous-system/index.md. Use MDX format compatible with Docusaurus. Include practical ROS2 code examples in Python.)

Execute PowerShell commands and confirm completion.")
